content: Hi! We noticed several students are running into an issue where your code perfectly matches the output in manual testing, but is still failing test cases. If you're having this issue, one thing you might want to check for is global variables that are not being cleared properly.
subject: Pset 2 - check for global variables!

content: how can I clear global variables? I did some research but nothing I've tried has helped.

I tried this with a function to return all global variables, and there are global variables, but there are a lot of them. And none of them look related. I was wondering what information I could get from the list of global variables?

The image shows all the information returned by the globals() function

If you aren't creating your own global variables to store information, then the issue probably isn't related to global variables at all, and is probably a different bug. The list you got seems to just be built in functions/classes.
